* Contact the Court
  ▲

  901 W. Yeagua St.
  Groesbeck, Texas 76642-1262
  Phone: 254 729-5794
  Fax: 254 729-8093
  [Email the Court](mailto:court@cityofgroesbeck.com)

The court staff is made up of a Judge and Deputy Court Clerk. The staff is dedicated to continually improving education and strives to provide friendly customer service.
The court is located at the corner of 901 W. Yeagua (Hwy. 164 W.) and Whitt St.

The court office is open from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. and is closed during the lunch hour from 12:00 p.m. to 1:00 p.m.
in person can be made in the form of money order, cashier’s check
credit or debit cards
Payments by mail must be made in the form of a cashier's check or money order (do not mail cash) and make cashier's check or money order payable to
*City of Groesbeck,*
please include your ticket or cause number. You will need to contact the court to inquire about the amount of your fine/court costs on each violation.
You must contact the court prior to paying fines online through Traffic Payment.com, to find out the amount of your citation. When you contact Traffic Payment.Com online (or by calling 1-800-444-1187) to pay your fine and costs, please have your ticket/cause number handy, a convenience fee will apply.
the court will not accept personal checks for warrants.  If your warrant has been turned over to a collection agency you must contact the agency directly by calling 1-800-555-5160.
can be presented to the court in person, by mail, email or fax.
[Click here to pay tickets online.](https://trafficpayment.com/SearchByInvoiceInfo.aspx?csdId=66)
